para.p:
Because
f
is multilinear and alternating, on the one hand

Math.text: g _ i * open-interval@(x _ i + x _ (i + 1), x _ i + x _ (i + 1)) = 0

para.p: and on the other hand

Math.text: g _ i * open-interval@(x _ i + x _ (i + 1), x _ i + x _ (i + 1)) = g _ i * open-interval@(x _ i, x _ i) + g _ i * open-interval@(x _ i, x _ (i + 1)) + g _ i * open-interval@(x _ (i + 1), x _ i) + g _ i * open-interval@(x _ (i + 1), x _ (i + 1))

para.p: Therefore

Math.text: g _ i * open-interval@(x _ (i + 1), x _ i) = - g _ i * open-interval@(x _ i, x _ (i + 1))
